author: Microsoft
name: .NET MAUI应用
description: 用于创建适用于 iOS、Android、Mac Catalyst、Tizen 和 WinUI 的 .NET MAUI 应用程序的项目
symbols/Framework/description: The target framework for the project.
symbols/Pipeline/choices/GitHub Actions/: Adds a GitHub Action file to build this .NET MAUI project.
symbols/Pipeline/choices/Azure Pipelines: Adds a Azure Pipelines file to build this .NET MAUI project.
symbols/Pipeline/description: Choose whether to include a build pipeline file for this .NET MAUI app.
